comment._content:
"Hard to believe" ;) that this is at a debutante party ... in the 1940's ... in Philadelphia no less -- the home of the 'Main Line'.

He's sock-less, with sneakers ... she appears to be wearing socks -- and is that a tiara?

In any event, their body language is priceless! ;)

comment._content: being bored, sock-less, beautiful and comfortable all come with being from being spoiled with too much money
